title: Frozen in Ranked Champ Select with nine others
body:
Upon entering Champ Select myself and nine others went through the normal steps, with my team having first pick and me fifth in the list. We picked our bans and preview champs, then went into the actual Selection process. Our first pick chose {{champion:222}} , and theirs picked {{champion:81}} . However, the third selection didn't go through and time ran out. I expected to automatically be returned to queue, but instead the client froze when the timer reached zero. Now my four teammates have left, but I am not sure if leaving will lose me any LP, nor were they. Could somebody please remedy the situation if I do?

-Thank you
Salamander246 (Teammates: Karalina, Enduring, Coco Plebbles, Bigdaddy Takeo)

replies.body: Help i can't queue up for ranked or normals draft pick. it just puts me on a loading screen and after a few seconds i get returned to the lobby
Same to me, no queue to draft mode.
Same exact thing happened to me about 2 hours ago and it still won't let me queue. Someone help please!
I just had a game where I was stuck in Ranked champ select and then it kicks me out saying that I didn't pick yet... There goes one of my promo games...
Getting the issue where I cannot start anything related to dynamic queue. Champ select froze at 0 seconds then we quit after 15 mins of nothing... can't play ranked at all now.

Hey everyone, just wanted to chime in here real quick.  This was an issue we tracked and resolved earlier.  For a bit more in-depth info, feel free to check out my post about [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/YntaUcF6-stuck-in-champ-select?comment=0009)!
Im guessing that it is on Riots end. Everything is fine on my end and it happens. Also lags and freezes during games for no reason.
People, the problem seems to be fixed, I check out already the LoL Client Game and I went to Draft Mode and this time It let me queue up, but hopefullly the frozen thingy issue it's fixed.
Same I can't do draft anymore only blind picks

i posted in another thread but reposting here, tried messing with firewalls, ipconfig flush and reinstalling nowthing worked. The problem began after someone else froze at 0 seconds in champ select. Cant do ranked or dynamic , only blinds.
this happened to me...i uninstalled and then reinstalled and it hasn't fixed a thing.
